supplements.name: Omega-3 EPA/DHA
supplements.why: Reduces inflammation and supports cardiovascular health
supplements.safety: Safe for most people, may interact with blood thinners

supplements.name: Magnesium glycinate
supplements.why: Supports muscle relaxation and sleep quality
supplements.safety: Generally well-tolerated, may cause loose stools at high doses

supplements.name: Ashwagandha
supplements.why: Adaptogen that helps with stress and energy

supplements.name: Vitamin C
supplements.why: Supports immune function and collagen synthesis

supplements.name: Rhodiola
supplements.why: Adaptogen for energy and stress management
supplements.safety: Generally safe, may cause mild stimulation
